title: u got riped of
body: riot i was playing league then i was shop then im like ok ill go see what this is and then i opened my shop then i went in the shop and the skin was 975 i was gonna pay 1235

replies.body:
If you don't have the champion already unlocked, the skin in Your Shop includes the champion. That's why the price may be higher. If that's not the case.. 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
